channel.title: Whirlwind Wheelchair
channel.description: A non-profit social enterprise dedicated to improving the lives of people with disabilities in the developing world while also promoting sustainable local economic development

item.title: Handcycle Trike Update
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: Aaron taks one last test drive on the handcycle trikes before they are shipped to Indonesia for the trike trial later this month!
item.content:encoded: Aaron taks one last test drive on the handcycle trikes before they are shipped to Indonesia for the trike trial later this month!

item.title: 2012 Whirlwind Annual Newsletter
item.dc:creator: Israel Curtis
item.description: In this issue: Handcycle trike development update Meet Dennis, Brian, and Crystal who are some of the first RoughRider users in the USA Introducing new teammates Laura and Kaleen Memoriam: Dwight and Vivian Johnson Letter from Whirlwind’s Executive Director Download the newsletter in PDF format .
item.content:encoded:
In this issue:

  • Handcycle trike development update
  • Meet Dennis, Brian, and Crystal who are some of the first RoughRider users in the USA
  • Introducing new teammates Laura and Kaleen
  • Memoriam: Dwight and Vivian Johnson
  • Letter from Whirlwind’s Executive Director
  • Download the newsletter in PDF format  .
